==Description==
A mediocre work of fiction telling the tale of an ordinary fellow who finds himself in another world after death.<br />
That world is filled with dangers. Steel monsters as vast as galaxies lurk beneath the ground and devour people in the thousands.<br />
But there also exist powerful beings who can make rooms comfortable in any season and turn night into day with a snap of their fingers. This is a story as groundless as it is meaningless.<br />
It only shares one thing in common with the real world: most of the precious metals are owned by a handful of individuals, who keep them locked up in the vault.
